pages.text: The Roadrunner is a small brown and yellow bird, with blue feathers on their tail, wings and head.$(br2)Roadrunners run around the desert at high speed searching they preis, $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/rattlesnake)Rattlesnakes$(/l).$(br2)On death, Roadrunners may drop Feathers and Roadrunner Feathers, you can use the last one to craft a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/bald_eagle)Falcony Hood$(/l).
Roadrunners can be bred with Maggots.
